name: AWAR
description:
Juego donde te embarcas en una aventura en búsqueda de un tesoro. Durante el camino tendrás que hacer frente a diversos piratas que impedirán que alcances tu objetivo.

Game where you embark on an adventure in search of treasure. Along the way you will have to face various pirates that will prevent you from reaching your goal.

[GAME IN SPANISH ONLY]

Assets by: Kenney (@KenneyNL on Twitter)
